title: Pack of 5, Multipack Large BBQ Lighters Refillable Safety Gas with Assorted Colours Suitable for Kitchen, Barbecue, Candles, Camping, Cooking, BBQs, Fireworks etc
features: Pack of 5, These BBQ Lighters include a long-reach lighter for hard-to-reach places. Must have for kitchen, can be used as gas lighter, candle lighter, kitchen lighter, BBQ lighter, firework lighter.
Refillable Gas Safety with Assorted Colours: Each refillable lighter is available in an assortment of colours to add style to your kitchen / cooker lighter or BBQ experience with long lighter.
Ideal for Kitchen, Barbecue, Candles, Camping, and cooking: Use these lighters multipack for various tasks such as lighting the BBQ or a cozy evening candle at home.
Long Lighter with Arc Ignition Flame: The longest arc lighter included in this pack has an arc ignition flame providing an easy and efficient way to light your log burners or firework displays.
These lighter enables for accurate lighting and heat control for BBQ, charcoal, and gas grills. Thees 5-pack lighters come with a visible fuel supply for quick refilling.

description: Product Description BBQ Lighters BBQ Lighters Advantages / Benefits Refillable Ergonomic Handle Long Nose for Multi Lighting Options Ideal for Kitchens, BBQs, Candles and Much More. Refillable Gas Refillable Gas Safety with Assorted Colours: Each refillable lighter is available in an assortment of colours to add style to your kitchen / cooker lighter or BBQ experience with long lighter. Multi Colour BBQ Lighters Adjustable Flame Control Enjoy precision and safety with the adjustable flame control feature. Whether you need a gentle flame for delicate tasks or a robust flame for quickly igniting your charcoal or firewood, this grill lighter's adjustable flame setting has you covered. Long Lighter with Ignition Flame The longest arc lighter included in this pack has an arc ignition flame providing an easy and efficient way to light your log burners or firework displays. Multi Colour BBQ Lighters These BBQ Lighters (Pack of 3) include a long reach lighter for hard to reach places. Must have for kitchen, can be used as gas lighter, candle lighter, kitchen lighter, BBQ lighter, firework lighter Child Safe Lock These amazing quality BBQ lighters come with as standard a child safety lock, so parents can feel at ease whilst children are in the kitchen. Ideal for Kitchens Multiple use and refillable makes the ezkart BBQ lighters the most popular. With a great sleek design and ease of use makes this a treat to have in all households. Long Nose for Better Reach Great long nose allows long reach in harder to get places such as deep candles. Specifications Dimensions 15L x 3W x 2H Centimetres. Refillable With its Universal nozzle can be refilled easily. Ergonomic Ergonomic handle gives it a sleeker style and makes it easier to hold. Childsafe Child safety lock. Adjustable Flame Allows you to take control on how high or low you would like the flame to be. Usage / Troubleshooting IGNITING: Half press the trigger for a second followed by a full press to ignite the lighter, INTIALY this may need to be done a few times to get the fuel circulated. FUEL: Within the handle there are two fuel chambers, to view a full chamber rotate the item from left to right. Please ensure this item is not dropped on the floor as it could cause damage to the internal components and cause the item to stop working. Colour / Shape Colour and shape may vary. RANDOMLY SELECTED.
